text: Basically, to compute and return confounds from out of mask. For example, white matter confounds will be returned if user gave grey_matter mask as an input image. Using `high_variance_confounds` and `randomized_svd`.
title: New feature: A function for compute_confounds_out_of_brain_mask
clean_text: basic comput return confound mask for exampl white matter confound return user gave greymatt mask input imag use
